Changes
=======

------------------
- Support for the pretxnchangegroup hook

------------------
- Fixes issue #2 about erros when removing files

0.1.1 (2010-06-13)
------------------
- Add documentatin about how to skip the checks

0.1.0 (2010-06-13)
------------------
- Initial release
